DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare fracture diagnostic, conventional x-ray versus ultrasound.
DOC.brief_title: Fracture Evaluated in Emergency Room by Ultra Sound
DOC.detailed_description: to compare fracture diagnostic, conventional x-ray versus ultrasound in an emergency room department.
DOC.criteria: Recent trauma to the wrist, ankle or fingers clinical exam by ER staff and xray indication. informed concent open fracture wounds unstable fractures requiring cast immobilisation before xray multi traumatised patients
